title: Kyler Secures The Bag
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss Kyler Murray’s brand new contract extension to keep him in Arizona through 2028, what Josh McDaniel’s offense will look like and if the 49ers will be worse off without Jimmy G under center. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Kyler Murray finally gets paid and what will Josh McDaniels offense look like in Vegas?
